name: Environment Design Grid
description: 3x3 environment sheet showing location from multiple perspectives
prompt: Create a professional environment reference sheet. Wide view of {LOCATION_TYPE}: {DESCRIPTION}. Time of day: {TIME}. Weather/Conditions: {CONDITIONS}. Atmosphere: {MOOD}. Photorealist, cinematic lighting, high quality, 8K. Multiple views showing spatial relationships, establishing shots, and key architectural or natural details. Consistent lighting and color grading throughout all panels.
